TenantSecurityMetricDetailLink.name: TenantSecurityMetricDetailLink
TenantSecurityMetricDetailLink.description: Represents the link between the metric count and metric drill down.

DetailIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for this detail record.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric counted. This field is unique within your organization.

Name.description: The name of the metric for the data collected.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant that was targeted in the event.
